transArray.content:
🚗 Transportation: The transportation is convenient, turn left when you go out to the subway entrance, it is super convenient to go to the scenic spots
🔔Service: The service is warm and thoughtful, and you can also store luggage. Praise 👍Very recommended
🍃Environment: The hotel is on Qianmen Street, where you can go shopping and eat along the way. The environment is very nice and convenient for travel. It is very close to Tiananmen Square and the Temple of Heaven
